SQL.LOAD: SELECT msg_type, msg_code, label_id, msg_parameter_count, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, msg_code_id FROM elp_message_code WHERE msg_code_id = :msg_code_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select mc.MSG_CODE_ID, mc.MSG_TYPE , mc.MSG_CODE, mc.LABEL_ID, mc.MSG_PARAMETER_COUNT , l.UI_PROG_CODE From elp_message_code mc INNER JOIN ELP_LABEL l on mc.label_id = l.label_id where 1=1 --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_message_code SET msg_type = :msg_type, msg_code = :msg_code, label_id = :label_id, msg_parameter_count = :msg_parameter_count, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE msg_code_id = :msg_code_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_message_code ( msg_type, msg_code, label_id, msg_parameter_count, created_by, msg_code_id ) VALUES ( :msg_type, :msg_code, :label_id, :msg_parameter_count, :created_by, :msg_code_id )
SQL.GET_EXISTING_MSG_CODE: select mc.MSG_CODE, l.UI_PROG_CODE from ELP_MESSAGE_CODE MC inner join ELP_LIST_ITEM li ON msg_type = li.LIST_ITEM_ID AND li.code = :code INNER JOIN ELP_LIST l ON l.LIST_ID = li.LIST_ID AND l.code = 'MSGTYPE' LEFT OUTER join ELP_LABEL L ON MC.LABEL_ID = L.LABEL_ID where msg_code = :msg_code or ui_prog_code = :ui_prog_code
SQL.GET_ID_FROM_MSGCODE: select mc.MSG_CODE_ID from ELP_MESSAGE_CODE MC inner join ELP_LIST_ITEM li ON msg_type = li.LIST_ITEM_ID AND li.code = :code INNER JOIN ELP_LIST l ON l.LIST_ID = li.LIST_ID AND l.code = 'MSGTYPE' LEFT OUTER join ELP_LABEL L ON MC.LABEL_ID = L.LABEL_ID where msg_code = :msg_code
